mean_cn: n.负责人，老板；首领，酋长；  adj.主要的，最重要的；首席的，最高级别的
mean_en: (often as a title) a leader or ruler of a people or community; a person with a high rank or the highest rank in a company or an organization
sentence: It's clear that the man with red hair is the chief of this barber shop.
sentence_trans: 很明显，这个红头发的男人是理发店老板。
